properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where (ProcessCommandLine endswith "svchost.exe" and FolderPath endswith "\\svchost.exe") and (not(((InitiatingProcessFolderPath endswith "\\rpcnet.exe" or InitiatingProcessFolderPath endswith "\\rpcnetp.exe") or isnull(ProcessCommandLine))))

tags.name: description
tags.value: It is extremely abnormal for svchost.exe to spawn without any CLI arguments and is normally observed when a malicious process spawns the process and injects code into the process memory space.
